channel.title: 471 Client with MY items?!
channel.description:
Hello there, I'm fairly new to the whole "Mopar/Silab" thing. I quit RS and I'm not one of those low levels retarded nubs. But I am one of those can't code kids. I don't know Java, I hardly know C#.
But straight to the point! Is there ANYway I could get a 471 client, such as Dog Eat Dog's client, to work with the items in my server, and not have the purple trim on the capes... Or the nulled items, or the corny looking D Boots.
If there is anyway, could I get a link to a [TuT] on how to make a client of my own? I just really need some help. Please, if you have any say so in this, just take a few seconds to put a quick post. :) Help is appretiated.

item.title: 471 Client with MY items?!
item.dc:creator: @VorargC VorargC
item.description:
@VorargC wrote:

D D 3:

Well i think your in the wrong section for a start this goes in rs2 client hacking.And it’s c++ not c#.And there’s alot of clients on google if you want a client with no trim.

There is a c# and a c++

Read full topic

Well i think your in the wrong section for a start this goes in rs2 client hacking.And it’s c++ not c#.And there’s alot of clients on google if you want a client with no trim.

I know it’s C++, I was just mentioning I’m no good at coding lol. Thanks for the reply, I’m defentaly going to check google. Seems they’re like the answer for everything! Ctrl Z is still the best helper Xd
